subject: YEARS AGREEMENT. INTEREST RATE: IN THE LOAN WE OFFER IS 1% INTEREST RATE
body:
DEAR REBECCA

GREETINGS IN THE NAME OF THE LORD ALMIGHTY AND OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST THE GIVER OF EVERY GOOD THING

GRACE TO YOU AND PEACE FROM GOD OUR FATHER AND THE LORD JESUS CHRIST.

FIRST LET ME START BY INTRODUCING MYSELF. I AM (REV.TONY GOOD).

THE PUBLISHER OF THE CHURCH OF JESUS IN HIS MIGHTINESS GLOBAL MINISTRY.

WE WANT YOU TO KNOW THAT WE HAVE THE CALLING FROM THE LORD TO HELP THOSE WHO ARE IN NEED AND IN FINANCIAL PROBLEM, BY GIVEN OUT LOAN TO ANY,INDIVIDUAL, COMPANY'S AND SOCIETY THAT NEED MONEY TO DO BUSINESS.
THE AMOUNT OF THE LOAN HAS BEEN SIGNED AND APPROVED BY THE CHURCH COMMITTEE THE SUM OF US$500,000.00 (FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND U.S DOLLARS). WHICH YOU HAVE THE PRIVILEGE TO LOAN

BUT YOU ARE TO RETURN THE LOAN WHICH IS GRANTED TO YOU IN (ONE).

YEARS AGREEMENT. INTEREST RATE: IN THE LOAN WE OFFER IS 1% INTEREST RATE.

WE ARE GIVING A MAXIMUM DURATION OF (ONE) YEARS TO THE LOAN SEEKER SO THAT HE /SHE WILL BE ABLE TO REPAY THE LOAN WITHIN THAT PERIOD.
I DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU'RE GOING THROUGH, BUT I WANT YOU TO KNOW TONIGHT THAT GOD FAVOR HAVE LOCATED YOU! THE LORD HEAR YOU IN THE DAY OF TROUBLE" THE NAME OF THE GOD OF JACOB DEFEND THEE SEND THEE HELP FROM THE SANCTUARY; AND STRENGTHEN THEE OUT OF ZION.
I SAY MORE HELP IS COMING; MORE HELP IS COMING YOUR WAY SOONER THAT YOU EXPECT. I MEAN DIVINE HELP. HEAVEN IS ABOUT TO RESPOND TO YOUR CALL.

(1). IT DOES NOT MATTER THE COMPLEXITY OF THAT PROBLEM.

(2). IT DOES NOT MATTER THE MULTIPLICITY OF THE ISSUES TROUBLING YOU.

(3). IT DOES NOT MATTER THE INTENSITY OF THE PRESSURE AND TENSION IN YOUR LIFE.

MAY THE GRACE OF OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST, THE LOVE OF GOD, AND THE FELLOWSHIP OF THE HOLY SPIRIT BE WITH YOU AND THE REST OF YOUR FAMILY.

IF YOU ARE INTERESTED KINDLY GET BACK TO US ASAP,MAY THE GRACE OF OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST, THE LOVE OF GOD, AND THE FELLOWSHIP OF THE HOLY SPIRIT BE WITH YOU AND THE REST OF YOUR FAMILY.

STAY BLESSED.
REV.TONY GOOD

subject: Re: YEARS AGREEMENT. INTEREST RATE: IN THE LOAN WE OFFER IS 1% INTEREST RATE
body:
Hello Good,

Thank you for your kind and uplifting message. It's really heartwarming to know that there are organizations like yours out there, dedicated to helping those in need. 

I'm curious about the loan program you mentioned. Could you tell me more about it? How does it work exactly? And what are the requirements for someone to be eligible?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: YEARS AGREEMENT. INTEREST RATE: IN THE LOAN WE OFFER IS 1% INTEREST RATE
body:
Dear Rebecca

I acknowledge the receipt of your email and the contents were fully understood.

Be Informed That We are lifting up to Those Who are suffering the pain of trials of every kind and Those Who are in need and in Financial Problem. and Also to Those Who are Experiencing heartaches from a broken home, overwhelming financial troubles, or serious health issues. This loan is real.

I hereby assured you that Your LOAN amount of  SUM OF $500,000.00 since you want only that  WHICH will be Granted to you since you needed $500,000.00.

IN RESPECT TO THE LOAN AMOUNT OF $500,000.00  We would need your personal data Which would enable us process your loan Which would be Transferred to you as soon as possible! The transfer of the loan must be a bank to bank transfer, except otherwise stated by the borrower Which means, you will have to Provide the means for Which you want your loan transfer to you.

The services of (PUT UR CHURCH NAME HERE) are rendered all over the world. All you need to do is 'comply with our rules and Regulations and Provide us with your correct details and contact address to be able to Process the loan in your favor, so far so good we have had most of people paid us back our money in the due time while some have given us incorrect and fake identities, with the intention of going with our money.

But we assure you That once your details are well given, we would offer you the Loan you want within (2) days of processing the Loan.

body:
Hello Rev. Tony Good,

Thank you for your swift response and the detailed information about the loan process. I'm glad to hear that your services are available worldwide and that you're helping people in need.

I understand that you require some personal details to process the loan, however, I would like to know more about the terms and conditions of this loan. Could you please provide me with more information on the interest rates, repayment period, and any other fees involved?

Also, could you kindly explain how the bank-to-bank transfer works? Is there a specific bank I need to have an account with or can it be any bank?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca
